title: Professional Data Engineer
bullets: Designs and operationalizes large-scale data processing systems on Google Cloud.
Certified in building secure, reliable, and cost-efficient analytics platforms.
Demonstrates production-grade expertise across streaming, batch, and governance layers.

title: Terraform Associate
bullets: Certified in Infrastructure as Code principles for repeatable, auditable deployments.
Applies Terraform to standardize cloud environments across teams and regions.
Strengthens platform reliability through versioned, automated infrastructure.

title: Prefect Associate
bullets: Certified in building resilient, observable data workflows using Prefect.
Implements orchestration patterns that reduce failure rates and manual intervention.
Brings software-engineering discipline to modern data pipeline operations.
